111.content:
A black screen is shown with a quote which reads: "I am tired and sick of war. Its glory is all moonshine...war is hell.
--WILLIAM T. SHERMAN
EARTH BEFORE THE WAR

Setting: Earth 2010 A.D. appears at the bottom of a black screen. An image of the Great Pyramids and nuclear missiles rising out of the ground before them appears on the screen. Nuclear missiles are seen rising out of the ground before the Washington Monument, the Eiffel Tower, the Statue of Libery, and Big Ben. Then , the screen switches to a large platform where thousands of people are running and screaming. Shuttles are taking off everywhere. Camera pans up to a cloudless blue sky and frames a nuclear missile that is heading straight for the platform. The screen goes black.

ALIEN HALLWAY

Earth 3010 A.D. is shown at the bottom of a black screen. A dark hallway, lit only by an eerie green glow is all that is seen. Then, JACKSON being dragged by two closely robed figures appears from around a corner. JACKSON has a bald head and a beard. The trio comes to what looks like a wall, but one of the robed figures reaches out a three-clawed hand. It inserts its claws into three holes positioned in a triangle and the wall slides open. The cloaked figures drag JACKSON into the room and set him before an alien.

ALIEN SCIENCE CHAMBER

CHAMIDA
Hello, human. I am going to ask you a question and I want an answer (threateningly) immediately. What are you doing here?

JACKSON spits in CHAMIDA'S face.

CHAMIDA
Perhaps you can be persuaded to answer my question. (Reaches up and puuls down an instrument shaped like an upside down dowl with two needles sticking out side by side. She then places the two needles in front of JACKSON'S eyes and camera switches to JACKSON'S perspective. There is a bright flash of violet light and everything becomes dark, wavering shadows as JACKSON screams. The camera switches back to third person perspective.) Now, has that persuaded you to talk?

JACKSON is silent.

CHAMIDA
(motioning to robed figures) Destroy him. (One of the robed figures pulls down another bowl-shaped instrument with a needle protruding from the base. He places the needle directly above JACKSON'S head and there's another flash of violet light. A trickle of blood runs down JACKSON'S head and the front of his face. He then shimmers and falls to the floor like water. His voice is heard in the background:

JACKSON
Help me...


RAILIN'S BEDROOM

RAILIN
(sitting up in bed) What a strange dream. (Gets out of bed and walks to a window, draws curtains aside and sunlight streams into the room. Camera pans around room: the posters are faded and yellowing at the edges. Outside, there is a blue and yellow sun in a purple sky. Enter ANSON REED.

ANSON
Hey Rai. What's up?

RAILIN
(a little confused)
I don't know. I had this weird dream. Something about aliens and some bald guy. I was (pauses) just weird. (turns back towards window)

ANSON
Maybe Mentez could help.

RAILIN
(enthusiastically)
Mentez is sure to know what my dream meant. After all, he's been around longer than anyone.

RAILIN walks into one one of the doorways and it slides shut behind her. Seconds later, she comes out fully dressed. RAILIN and ANSON exit.

NEW HOPE HALLWAY

ANSON
So, tell me about your dream.

RAILIN
(struggling)
Well, it's kind of hard to explain. There was this guy and he was being asked questions by this really weird looking thing. And then (she pauses and tears come to her eyes)

ANSON
Then...

RAILIN doesn't answer.

ANSON
Rai? Rai!
RAILIN
(snapping out of her trance)
What?

ANSON
Then what happened?

RAILIN
They killed him, but that's not the strange part. When they killed him, he fell to the floor like water and even though he was dead I thought I heard him ask for help. But what's even more strange is that I felt like I knew him. Like, like (struggling) like he was my brother.

ANSON
(matter of factly)
Well of course you did. I mean, you're the one who dreamt it.

RAILIN
No, that's not it. It's different...somehow.

ANSON
Well, you can ask Mentez, because we're here.

RAILIN and ANSON enter MENTEZ'S room.

MENTEZ'S CHAMBERS

RAILIN and ANSON enter into the room. MENTEZ is sitting on a rug in the center of the room.

ANSON
Mentez?

MENTEZ
Yes?

ANSON
My sister had a dream and she’d like to know what it meant.









MENTEZ
(looks towards RAILIN)
Come here, child, and look into my eyes. RAILIN walks towards MENTEZ and looks into his eyes. Her dream is replayed in them. Ah, I see. You seek guidance little one and I am here to give that to you. It all begins with a story of long ago. You may want to have a seat as this story will take a while. ANSON and RAILN sit on the rug across from MENTEZ. It all started many years ago. Cut to younger MENTEZ sitting at a computer. I had found a file in the “Archives of Earth.” It said that we had fled Earth in 2010 A.D. during a world-wide nuclear war. Within that file I found a story about a young man who was the only one to survive from his allotted escape ship. His name was Maritime Reed, one of your ancestors. You see, the ship he had been on was severely damaged as it crossed the asteroid belt and he had to stop by our humble outpost before continuing on to his scheduled planet. He was, however, a drifter by heart and I often thought he didn’t plan on going to that planet. But while he was here he met a beautiful woman named Atonia and he was instantly in love. Time went on and Maritime and Atonia were married. They had children and their children had children. This continued for many years and when your father, Talonis, was born and married your mother, they had three children.

RAILIN
Gasps
But there have only ever been two of us!

MENTEZ
Ah, but the third child was the man in your dream. He was your older brother, Jackson. Eighteen years ago, right before you were born Anson, he left on a mission to Earth. Our elders had wanted to send an expedition to see if we could return to our rightful home. Your brother was chosen to head the expedition. It seems, Railin, that you and Jackson had a special connection, one that allows the other to see their final dying thoughts. When the elders sent those explorers they never counted on alien infestation being a variable.

ANSON
I don’t believe it! We have an older brother, who our parents never told us about and now you’re saying he’s dead, sent to some stupid planet on an idiotic mission.

MENTEZ
Irritated
Calm yourself, Anson. Nothing you believe in can ever be stupid. Your brother believed in the mission he was sent on. So much, in fact, that he was willing to sacrifice his own life. Sadly, it seems we must go to war with these alien vermin.

RAILIN
But why? They never did anything to us!




MENTEZ
Putting a hand on RAILIN’S shoulder
War, like so many things, is human nature. Especially when claiming what is yours from scum that has taken it from you.

ANSON
I still don’t believe it. How could we have an older brother and our parents never tell us about him?

ENTER CAPTAIN TALONIS REED

TALONIS
Because we thought he had died years ago. As he was landing on earth we heard shots firing and people screaming. His communicator went out and we thought he had died. We waited for many years to hear from him, but you can only wait so long. When you were born, Anson, we had given up hope. Your mother and I decided that it would be best not to tell you. We didn’t want you to have to endure the pain that comes from wondering, every day, if your loved one is alive or dead.

ANSON
Angrily
But could you? I mean—

TALONIS
I was protecting you and Railin! Begins to shout: Do you know how much pain and suffering there is in life? I couln’t expose my children to more than they’d already have to bear!

ANSON
Close to tears
How could you deny your son the right to know he had a brother?
Exits quickly from room

RAILIN
Walks over to stand beside her father
Don’t worry, Dad. Anson just needs some time to cool off. He’ll be okay.

TALONIS looks down at RALIN through tears. RALIN smiles up at him and then exits. TALONIS sits down at the table and weeps into his hands. MENTEZ hovers in the background.

RALIN’S ROOM

RALIN is sitting on her bed reading a book when an alarm begins going off. Running footsteps are heard outside her door and ANSON bursts in.

ANSON
Railin! It’s starting! Hurry, we don’t have much time!

RALIN
Trying to yell over the sirens,
What?

ANSON
Don’t ask questions. Just follow me. Hurry!

SPACE SHUTTLE

RAILN and ANSON run into a large room where ships are taking off and they board one. ANSON sits down at the controls.

RAILIN
What’s all this about, Anson? Where are we going?

ANSON
Earth.

RAILIN
Earth?! Why?

ANSON
To find out brother. I know he’s still alive. I just know it!

RAILIN
Anson, he’s dead. I saw it in my dream. Mentez said so. Father agreed too.

ANSON
What father?

RALIN
Anson, he was just protecting you.

ANSON doesn’t answer.

RALIN
Anson?

Still no answer from ANSON

RAILIN
Pauses, stares gloomily out the window
How’d you get this craft, anyway?
ANSON
I joined The Officials.

RAILIN
You what?

ANSON doesn’t answer. He’s concentrating on flipping switches and pulling levers.

RALIN
Anson?

ANSON
Yeah.

RALIN
Why?

ANSON
To show father that I’m just as good as Jackson.

RAILIN begins crying softly and moments later a voice crackles over the radio.

LT. TOYA
Private Reed. Come in.

ANSON
Lifts what looks like a watch to his mouth
Reed here. What can I do for you Lieutenant?

RALIN stifles a sob.

LT. TOYA
What was that?

ANSON
Nervously
Um…that was my sister ma’am.

LT. TOYA
Angrily
Private Reed! I told you this was a dangerous top secret mission. No civilians permitted aboard any ship. Why did you go against my orders?

ANSON
I had to Lieutenant. I couldn’t leave behind my family.

LT. TOYA
What about you father?

ANSON is silent.

LT. TOYA
Reed?

ANSON
Coldly
I have no father…

MAKESHIFT HQ, LT. TOYA’S TENT

LT. TOYA
How could you have done something so stupid…so irresponsible…so arrogant? You knew that no civilians were not to be brought along on this mission. You have jeopardized this entire expedition. Why did you go against the orders of your superior?

ANSON
Snapping to attention
Some rules need to be broken if you want to take care of your family, ma’am!

LT. TOYA
That is no excuse for disobeying direct orders. Drop and give me fifty!

ANSON begins his push-ups.

LT. TOYA
I can’t hear them…

ANSON
1, 2, 3…

Enter GENERAL ELIOT MATTHEWS

LT. TOYA
Attention!

ANSON stands and salutes.

GEN. MATTHEWS
At ease, Private. I happened to hear what you did, bringing a civilian on this mission.



ANSON
Hesitantly
Yes sir, I did. And I deeply apologize for going against the rules.

GEN. MATTHEWS
No, no. Don’t apologize. It was a job well done. You se, I also heard that the civilian was your sister. Family comes first, you know.

ANSON
Yes sir. Thank you, sir.

GEN. MATTHEWS
That kind of loyalty deserves a promotion which is why I am promoting you to Corporal.

ANSON
Th-Thank you, sir.

GEN. MATTHEWS
Don’t mention it, my boy. Welcome to The Officials. I’ll let you and the LT. get back to your exercises. It’s always commendable seeing someone keeping in shape when they don’t have to do so.

Exit GEN. MATTHEWS

LT. TOYA
Well, what are we going to about your civilian sister, sneers, Corporal Reed?

ANSON
I’m not quite sure ma’am. The orders were for no civilians to be brought on this mission.

LT. TOYA
Well, we’ll just have to change that, won’t we?

ANSON
But how?

LT. TOYA
I think I have an idea.


ANSON
What is it? You must tell me.




LT. TOYA
No, long pause, not really.
Dismissed!

ANSON exits.

ANSON/RAILIN’S TENT

ANSON
Walks over to a chair, sits and begins to weep.
What am I going to do? I can’t do this anymore. Slips out of chair and falls to knees with hands clasped together. Lord, please help me. I can’t carry this burden by myself. Please send someone to help me.

Enter RAILIN.

RAILIN
Rushes over to ANSON.
Anson, what’s wrong? Are you okay?

ANSON
Quickly stands and composes self.
Oh, I’m fine. Just going through some, uh, discipline exercises.

RAILIN
Skeptically
Okay. Whatever.

ANSON
What are you doing here anyway? I thought you were out taking a tour.

RAILIN
Oh. Lt. Toya told me you wanted to see me. Something about protocol?

ANSON
half to himself
I can’t believe that woman.

RAILIN
Something wrong?

ANSON
Oh no. Nothing’s wrong. It’s just that, uh, I have some news that I don’t think you’re going to appreciate hearing.


RAILIN
Well, from the expression on your face, I don’t think you like it very much either.

ANSON
Gestures to the only chair in the tent
You may want to sit down for this.

RAILIN sits

ANSON
Grimacing
This is hard news to bear. Especially to a family member who I feel solely reliable for, but long pause, mumbles.

RAILIN
What? I couldn’t hear you.

ANSON
You’re going to have to join The Officials.

RAILIN
What?!

ANSON
You’re going to—

RAILIN
I know! I heard you!

ANSON
Rai. I can’t help feeling responsible for this.

RAILIN
That’s because you are responsible for it!

ANSON
Railin, I’m sorry. It’s just that civilians weren’t supposed to be on this mission. And, well, since you’re a civilian that problem needs to be solved. I’m sorry.

RAILIN
Don’t talk to me. I don’t want you to talk to me, ever again!

Exit RAILIN.

ANSON falls to his knees crying. Then prostrates himself, buries his face in his hands and cries even harder.
ANSON
I’m sorry, Rai. Please forgive me. I’m so sorry…

Camera fades.

CHAMIDA THRONE ROOM

CHAMIDA
Two robed standing on either side of her.
You pathetic human. You think you can beat us. You have no idea how powerful I am. I can have your limbs torn off with a single wave of my hand. But that would be much too nice of a treatment for you worthless kind. Snaps fingers and one of the robed figures produces a jar full of inky, black liquid. The jar is handed to CAPTAIN TALONIS. Please with contempt Captain, look into the jar you are holding.

CAPTAIN TALONIS looks into the jar and two eyeballs float to the top. The pupils dilate.

JACKSON
Please…help me…father.

The eyes sink.

CAPTAIN TALONIS
Hysterically
Jackson! My son! Come back!

JACKSON is silent.

CAPTAIN TALONIS
Sadly
Please, come back. Your mother I, we—I need you.

CHAMIDA
Enough! Snaps fingers and the jar is taken away from TALONIS. So, do we have a deal?

TALONIS
Shamefully
If you return my son then yes, I will do whatever you wish.

CHAMIDA
Good. Good. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated. CHAMIDA turns to a robed figure and in hushed voice, A soon as tells us what we want to know, have him killed.

Robed figure bows in response.


RALIN & ANSON’S TENT

RAILIN awakes in her cot, beside ANSON.

ANSON
Waking up
Rai? What’s wrong?

RAILIN
It’s--Oh, I can’t—I mean…
Begins to cry harder.

ANSON
Gets out of bed and walks over to RAILIN, sits down on her bed and holds her as she cries.
Shhh. It’s okay. I’m here. Calm down. It’s okay.

RAILIN begins to calm down, but still breathing and sniffing heavily.

ANSON
Now, tell me what happened.

RAILIN
It was our fther. He was in some sort of throne room with an alien. And he was on his knees and Jackson—

ANSON
Jackson! What about Jackson? Was he alive? Is he alive?

RAILIN
I don’t know. It was all so horrible. And is still so vague. But the one thing I do remember is that father said he was going to help the aliens.

ANSON
Father said that! I knew he was a traitor. Lt. Toya must hear about this.
Begins to dress.

RAILIN
But Anson-

ANSON
Not now, Rai. I’ve got to get to Lt. Toya.
Exits quickly.




RAILIN
Half to self.
But Anson, it was just a dream. Begins to cry.

Alarms sound.

ANSON
Running back into the tent.
Railin, get dressed! The aliens have found us! They’re attacking! We’ve got to go NOW!

RALIIN dresses and exits quickly with ANSON.

BLACK SCREEN: Quote: “He who is the author of a war lets loose the whole contagion of hell and opens a vein that bleeds a nation to death.” ~Thomas Paine

NEW HOPE CONFERENCE ROOM

MENTEZ
The aliens must be stopped. As we hold this counsel our base on earth is being attacked by them.

ELDER #1
That’s because we’ve invaded thir home. They are scared and as savages tend to do they are fighting what they do not understand.

ELDER #5
They are not savages! They are intelligent beings from another planet as all of my studies have shown us.

CELIA
Oh, pooh on your research. I agree with Mentez. We should fight the aliens. That is our ancestor’s land and we have a right to take it back.

MENTEZ
Thank you, Celia. I’m glad that someone is on my side. But I didn’t call this meeting so we could sit here and bicker. I called it because the people who sit at this table have the power to release the Lusus Naturae. Several gasp I know, I know, but with it’s help we have a chance to win this war. We’ve already had World War Three and now after thousands of years of somewhat peace we may have the first War of the Universe.

FATHER MONTGOMERY
But if we release Lusus, then we may vary well call Armageddon down upon ourselves. For you all know Lusus was created in the form of a dragon. The Lucites worshipped dragons and thus created him in that form. Also, our ancestors speak of a dragon, in the Holy Texts, that takes control of the world in the ending days and almost destroys it.

FATHER COPEN
So you are saying that this Lusus may be the Anti-Christ? How ridiculous! He is under our control. How can something we control rule over us? The entire idea is preposterous!

FATHER MONTGOMERY
You new priests and your absurd ideas. Just because we control something now doesn’t mean we will control it always. Lusus is as unpredictable as a human. He was created to help stop the third world war, but he was created to kill. That is why he was imprisoned on the moon as our ancestors left earth.

FATHER COPEN
If we imprisoned him once, then we can do it again.

MENTEZ
Please, please, calm yourself my friends. That is why I have called all of you here today; to discuss this matter. If we release the Lusus Naturae then we can easily defeat the Aliens and save ourselves, but we may begin Armageddon. Becoming angry I want to end this matter and I want to end it now! We decide now. Release the Lusus Naturae or fight the aliens by ourselves. Who says to release the monstrosity?

Five raise their hands.

MENTEZ
And who says to keep it imprisoned?

Five raise their hands.

MENTEZ
Well it seems that I hold the world in my hands. I must cast the deciding vote though it bears a heavy weight on me to do so. I say we release him tomorrow. This counsel is now adjourned.

The camera zooms in on FATHER COPEN, a large smile spreads across his face and fire flares in his eyes. [Fade.]

MOON OF LUSUS NATURAE
A gigantic blue dragon muzzled and chained in the center of the crater stares down at FATHER COPEN, FATHER MONTGOMERY, and MENTEZ.


LUSUS
Why do you insist on keeping me chained here like an animal? Did I not free your ancestors from a great and terrible threat? My work is done now. I am harmless…



MENTEZ
Yes, you did free our ancestors, but if you are so harmless then why did they imprison you here?

LUSUS
Because they were all fools. They did not have the knowledge you have. Human brains now must be far larger than they were then.

FATHER COPEN
He does have a point Mentez. If we release him we can control him much more easily than our ancestors did.

LUSUS
Barely audible.
Yesss.

MENTEZ
I’m not sure if that is completely correct, but we do need his help. Very well, take your positions.

FATHER MONTGOMERY moves to the left side of LUSUS and FATHER COPEN moves to the right where they both begin sifting through the dirt where the chains are connected to the earth as MENTEZ does the same in front LUSUS. They each take keys that hang around their knees and place them in locks that are found in the ground. As they turn the keys the chains fall along with muzzle and disintegrate before hitting the ground. LUSUS lets out a mighty roar and FATHER MONTGOMERY cringes.

LUSUS
Bends towards FATHER MONTGOMERY
So you are afraid of me? That will not do. If you are afraid of me then everyone else will be as well. Perhaps…to self…yes that’s it.
LUSUS begins to what looks like fold and when he is finished “folding” he is a man with that are milky white. This will not scare many people, correct? LUSUS looks at MENTEZ.

MENTEZ
Eyes wide with awe.
I believe the new form you have taken will do just fine.

FATHER COPEN
Perhaps with your new form, you would like to choose a new name?

LUSUS looks oddly at FATHER COPEN




FATHER COPEN
Speaking quickly
Strictly so you will not cause suspicion among others and be bombarded with questions or turned away from. The name Lusus is widely recognized and known on the new planet. Especially among our youth, who seem to have a fondness for stories of the Old World.

LUSUS
Yes, I belive a new name would be quite useful. I also feel ready for a change. What do you think of, long pause, Noangelo—Noa for short.

FATHER COPEN
Ah, what a wonderful name. I will personally see to it that your identifications are made in that name.

MENTEZ
Looking toward the horizon where New Hope can be seen
It is getting late. Perhaps we should be returning to New Hope.

FATHER MONTGOMERY
Quite right, Mentez. It is beginning to become a bit chilly. FATHER MONTGOMERY throws a cautionary glances at LUSUS and speaks half to himself And I wouldn’t want to be on this planet with that thing after sunset.

LUSUS
Pulls dark glasses from a pocket inside his jacket and puts them on.
If you’ll follow me then I think I can show you something which you’ll find quite useful. Begins walking towards the side of the crater, but stops halfway and bends down, brushing dirt aside. A metal trap door with three key holes in a triangular pattern is seen. I do believe we’ll need the use of those keys again.

The keys are put in the holes and the trap door is opened.

LUSUS
This is something that the people of the Old World left in my care. I was to show it to the ones who released me. Please follow me.

LUSUS climbs down into the darkness followed by MENTEZ, FATHER COPEN and then FATHER MONTGOMERY. Camera follows them into the darkness. [END SCENE]








HUMAN BASE.

Different styles of ships are flying through the sky shooting at each other. Camera enters Lt. Toya’s tent.

ANSON
Out of breath
Lt. Toya! I have some wonderful news!

LT. TOYA
Buttoning shirt
What can be wonderful about being attacked by aliens?

ANSON
It’s not about the aliens, it’s about Captain Reed. I know something that could help you gain his position.

LT. TOYA
skeptically
Really? And what might that be?

ANSON
Not now. First you have to agree that Railin can stay a civilian.

LT. TOYA
Done! Now what is this wonderful news?

ANSON
Captain Talonis Reed is planning on helping the alien race overthrow our defenses. If we act quickly this can work to our advantage.

LT. TOYA
How did you come by this information. No, don’t tell me. It could be a court-martial able offense. Long pause I assume you have a plan?

ANSON
Yes ma’am.

LT. TOYA
Okay. I’m putting you in charge of Platoons three and five. Brief them on your plan and report back to me in two hours.

ANSON
Yes ma’am! Salutes and leaves the tent in a hurry.


LT. TOYA
To self
Finally! If I can get rid of Captain Reed all that stands in my way will be that old fool Mentez. Soon everyone will bow to Queen Ramona Toya. Laughs evilly

Camera pans to shadowy corner, enters and comes out in CHAMIDA’S throne room where CHAMIDA and her two guards were watching the scene on a monitor.

CHAMIDA
Excellent! Everything is going just as I have planned. Isn’t that wonderful Captain Reed?

TALONIS
Turns to face CHAMIDA and device is attached to back of neck
No, it’s not. You’re horrible.

CHAMIDA presses a button on her throne and lights blink of TALONIS’S device.

TALONIS
Forgive me, my queen. Bows You’re idea is brilliant beyond all comprehension and it will be a wonderful ruse once everything has played out.

CHAMIDA
I hope you are right. For your sake and for all of our species sake.

[Camera fades into next scene.]

HALL OF HUMANS (HALLWAY ON MOON)

LUSUS
Reaches out a hand and touching a panel
Welcome to the Hall of Humans.

The green lights flash brightly and what appear to be fetuses can be seen floating inside large containers. Their eyes are wide open and blinking. Once reaches out a hand to FATHER MONTGOMERY. FATHER MONTGOMERY reaches out his hand and LUSUS steps in between.

LUSUS
Careful, Father. These are no ordinary humans. I wouldn’t get near any of these people if I were you.

LUSUS steps away from the container and the person in the container is looking directly at FATHER MONTOGOMERY, but we see the creature’s back. It’s head begins to revolve slowly to the front.


FATHER MONTGOMERY
How does this place exist? Why does it exist?

LUSUS
This, my friend, is where your ancestors tried to solve the mysteries of life. They never did succeed though and they did make a few mistakes along the way. These, Father, are just a few of the less harmful ones. The more terrible creatures are many decks below us.
LUSUS smiles crookedly

FATHER COPEN
Lusus? What do you mean the more terrible ones? And how have these creatures survived all of these years?

LUSUS
Bored
The scientists that created these creatures may have been twisted, but they were not cruel. Each of these creatures has a new way of survival. That creature you encountered earlier, Father Montgomery, feeds off of energy…any energy. Even human energy. If you had touched that glass you’d be lying on their right now. Slow smile. Most likely dead.

The group walks into a large circular room with a shaft of dark red light in the center. In the light is what looks like an egg. To the right is a large piece of velvet black cloth draped over a rectangular object.

LUSUS
Walking over to the cloth covered object
This, gentlemen, is your way home.

LUSUS pulls cloth off of object to reveal two prongs sticking in the air with a shimmering static in between the two. LUSUS presses a few buttons on a control panel and the New Hope conference room appears between the two prongs.

MENTEZ
This technology is amazing! I never knew it existed. Why don’t we still have these capabilities?

LUSUS
Well, let’s just say there were…complications.

FATHER MONTGOMERY
Slightly scared
Is this technology safe for us to use?




LUSUS
A bit distracted and fiddling with the control panel
Yes, yes of course. But we must hurry. There’s not much power left in this old equipment. Pauses Please, my friends, just step into the image and you should be instantly transported back to your world. You may feel a bit disoriented when you arrive, but that’s normal. Mentez, if you’d be kind enough to step forward, I’ll monitor the equipment.

MENTEZ
Hesitantly steps towards the portal.
And you’re sure this is not dangerous.

LUSUS
Absolutely, the most you’ll feel is a little…tickle.

MENTEZ
Turns towards FATHER MONTGOMERY
I’ll see you soon. Turns back to portal and half to self: This should be interesting.
MENTEZ steps through the portal, into the Conference Room, turns around and waves.

LUSUS
Father Montgomery, it’s your turn now.

FATHER MONTGOMERY
Visibly nervous
I suppose if Mentez is waving, then he was not hurt in any way. He looks well enough.
FATHER MONTGOMERY steps toward the portal and it begins to flicker, he hesitates and looks towards to LUSUS.

LUSUS
Becoming irritated
Please Father, there’s nothing to worry about. It was just a power surge. This machine is almost out of energy. All you need to do is step into the image and you’ll be home. FATHER MONTGOMERY turns toward the portal, closes his eyes and under breath:
Here I go. He steps into the image and embraces MENTEZ after a brief pause. They both turn to motion FATHER COPEN to join them.

LUSUS
Pulls FATHER COPEN to the side, where MENTEZ and FATHER MONTGOMERY cannot see. LUSUS holds FATHER COPEN’S head between his hands.
My child, you have done well. My release is exactly what the universe needs and you will be greatly rewarded. LUSUS kisses FATHER COPEN on the forehead who winces as flames flare in his eyes.

FATHER COPEN
Thank you Master. I will not let you down.

LUSUS
For your sake, I hope you don’t. Now go, join the others. You know what is expected of you.

As FATHER COPEN steps towards the portal and the image of the conference room begins to flicker faster.

LUSUS
Hurry, there’s not much time

FATHER COPEN
Thank you Master. Steps through the portal

LUSUS
To no one in particular
I would not be thanking someone who will be the downfall of your race.

The image of the conference room begins to flicker even faster, then disappears. The screen goes black.

ANSONS TENT
A large group of men is gathered, some sitting, some standing.

ANSON
You have your orders. Until I signal you, you are all to go about your business as normal. Is that clear?

Men salute in unison: Yes, sir!

ANSON
Okay. You are all dismissed, except for Privates Jones, Johnson and Harden.

All others exit

ANSON
You three are to forget everything we just went over. You are going to come with me and we are going to save Captain Reed and hopefully get rid of LT. Toya in the process.

The privates exchange glances and smiles begin to creep across their faces.

PRIVATE JOHNSON
Permission to speak freely, sir?

ANSON
Granted.

PRIVATE JOHNSON
It’s about time someone had the balls to take out that woman. Sir, we salute you all salute and will do all we can to help you with this mission.

ANSON
I was hoping you’d say that. I picked each of you because you all have specific talents that will help with this mission, but also because you three have been singled out by the L.T. as troublemakers, just as I have. If she has her way we’ll be the first ones gone and I don’t mean court marshaled, honorable or otherwise. Johnson, I picked you because you’re an expert in stealth and demolitions. [flashback with voiceover] You showed all of us that when the officer’s latrines exploded last week.

PRIVATE JOHNSON
Mouth gaping open
No one knew that was me.

ANSON
Well, no one, but you and me.
Turns to PRIVATE JONES
Jones, you’re here because you have a way of getting what you want. You have connections throughout the unit and those connections are going to be very useful to us. B

PRIVATE JONES
Lights up a cigarette
I do what I can. Smiles

ANSON
And Harden…you’re probably the best pilot this army has ever seen. But they think you take too many risks. Myself, I like risks. You’ll be the one getting us in and out of the alien’s lair. Pauses Now that you all know why you’re here I can tell you the real plan.

[Camera zooms back as sound fades. Camera zooms out of the tent and RAILIN is standing by the flap peering inside just out of view of the men. A smile slowly creeps across her face. FADE]


PLANET NEW HOPE
New Hope is seen on the screen, numbers are quickly ticking down from 24:00. When they reach “0” New Hope explodes. A dragon flies toward the screen and the camera enters the dragon’s mouth. Screen goes black.






FATHER MONTGOMERY’S ROOM

The room is dark, a digital clock reads 4:23 AM.

FATHER MONTGOMERY
Waking up quickly and sitting up in bed.
Thank God. It was only a dream. But…what does it mean?

LUSUS
Walking out of the shadows

It means lifts a hand towards FATHER MONTGOMERY and squeezes it into a fist, FATHER MONTGOMERY gasps, grabbing his chest that your races time coming to an end.

FATHER MONTGOMERY winces in pain and slumps over. CREATURE emerges from the shadows that LUSUS came from.

LUSUS
Take care of him.

CREATURE raises its hands (tiny mouths are seen in its palms) and places its hands on FATHER MONTGOMERY. CREATURE’S head begins turning as FATHER MONTGOMERY’S body begins to shrink and finally disappears. As CREATURE’S head makes its last turn its face has taken on FATHER MONTGOMERY’S appearance.

LUSUS
Very good. You are to remain here and act as the late Father would.

CREATURE
Guttural
Yes clears throat and in voice of FATHER MONTGOMERY Yes master. I will do whatever you ask of me. After all, you did free me from that scowls prison. And I would do anything for revenge on the scum that imprisoned me.

LUSUS
Smiling So would I long pause So would I.
Looks out window and the camera follows.








HUMAN SPACE SHUTTLE

Anson, Privates Jones, Johnson and Harden are present. A large mountain can be seen through the “window.”

PRIVATE HARDEN
Half a cigarette in his mouth
Buckle up, it looks like we’re going to have visitors.

Six alien ships fly out of a cave in the side of the mountain and head towards the human shuttle.

ANSON
Get ready everyone. The fun is about to begin.

The other two privates buckle into stations on either side of the ship. ANSON begins climbing towards a seat in the ceiling as a voice crackles over the speaker.

MUER
My name is Muer. You have entered restricted territory. Please disarm your weapons and follow our lead ship.

There appears an alien vessel on every side of the human shuttle as an alien vessel rises into view in the window, a large blinking blue light at the center of its back.

ANSON
Prepare to fire.

MUER
You have five seconds to disarm your weapons or it will be necessary for us to use force. 5, 4, 3…

ANSON
Fire on all sides.

Multiple concussive booms are heard as the human shuttle rocks back and forth. A red light begins to flash and an alarm sounds.

PRIVATE HARDEN
Sir! We’ve been hit on all sides. It seems every fire we shot was ricocheted back at us. You might want to prepare for a very rough landing. To self If I could bend over far enough, I’d kiss my butt goodbye.

As the ground looms nearer, faster and faster, through the window, it suddenly stops and begins to back away as a blue glow fills the vision in the window.

MUER
You were warned, but as it was a first offense I will overlook it. Now, if you’d be kind enough to join us. We have much to discuss.

PRIVATE JOHNSON
Like we have a choice.
